title: Episode 139 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Primary source for episode information including air dates, plot summary, character debuts, production credits, and viewership ratings. Comprehensive and well-maintained wiki page.

title: Ruluka Island Arc - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Detailed information about the entire Ruluka Island Arc (Episodes 139-143), including plot synopsis, character information, and the note that this was the last filler arc dubbed by 4Kids.

title: Henzo - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Complete character profile for Henzo including appearance, personality, backstory, relationships, and role in the arc. Essential for character development information.

title: Rapanui Pasqua - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Character profile detailing Rapanui's appearance, Finger Bomb technique, dual identity as Marine officer and childhood friend of Henzo, and the Easter Island name etymology.

title: Rainbow Mist - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Information about the Rainbow Mist phenomenon, its time-distortion properties, and the continuity issue with the Wano Arc's time travel.

title: Hikari e - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Details about Opening 3 'Hikari e' by The Babystars, used for episodes 116-168. Includes information about the Funimation English version by Vic Mignogna.

title: Free Will - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Information about Ending 9 'Free Will' by Ruppina, used for episodes 133-156. Notes that it features Robin prominently and shows glimpses of her past.

title: One Piece (2004 TV Show) - Behind The Voice Actors
author: BTVA Contributors
notes: Source for Japanese and English voice actor information for characters in Episode 139, including Henzo and Rapanui Pasqua.

title: One Piece Filler Arcs, Part 1 -- Dragons, Goats and Rainbow Mists
author: Stephen (Blackjack Rants)
notes: Critical analysis of the Ruluka Island Arc. Published March 30, 2021. Provides fan perspective on arc quality, pacing issues, and narrative problems.

title: 139: 'Legend of the Rainbow Mist! Old Man Henzo of Ruluka Island!'
author: neverwatchedonepiece
notes: Positive episode review from a first-time viewer dated January 31, 2015. Provides fresh perspective on Episode 139's strengths in worldbuilding and atmosphere.

title: One Piece: Ruluka Island Arc (Filler) | Summary, Recap & Review
author: Poggers
notes: Comprehensive review of the entire Ruluka Island Arc with a critical rating of 4.5/10. Discusses the arc's shortcomings in narrative coherence and pacing.

title: 15 Worst One Piece Filler Arcs, Ranked
author: Screen Rant
notes: Ranking article that includes the Ruluka Island Arc among One Piece's weaker filler arcs, citing limited Straw Hat involvement.

title: One Piece - Episode 139: Legend of the Rainbow Mist! Old Man Henzo of Luluka Island!
author: Toei Animation
notes: Official streaming source for Episode 139 with subtitles. Primary official source for viewing the episode.

title: Ruluka Island Arc - One Piece - Fandorable
author: Fandorable
notes: Analysis of the Ruluka Island Arc covering plot, themes, cultural impact, and critical reception for all episodes 139-143.

title: One Piece - Niji-iro no Kiri Densetsu! Ruluka Tou no Roujin Henzo
author: IMDb Contributors
notes: IMDb page for Episode 139 with rating of 6.7/10, original Japanese title, and basic episode information.
